attributes.action: Bolsover recreational facilities for teenagers and children
attributes.additional_details:
We desperately need public facilities for the youth of Bolsover to use.
There are pretty much zero public recreational facilities available in Bolsover town that teenagers & children can participate in, unlike other similar surrounding areas that have leisure centres, skate parks etc. etc.
We need to ask why this is, and why investment is not considered for the youth of Bolsover town area.
Please listen to the heart of the community and invest in the young people here and encourage families to remain in the town of Bolsover (at present there is very little reason to do so).
Thank you for taking the time to read this and hopefully with your support we can make a difference to the future in the town of Bolsover.
Your support is greatly appreciated and with this we hope to make a difference to the current mind-set in relation to the development and consideration of the younger people of Bolsover town.
Bradley Marsh/12 years old
